# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This item is truly a testament to excellence and could be a game-changer for your needs. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150 to many users. Considering its high-quality nature and potential impact on your life or work, I am offering you this opportunity at an introductory price of $200. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring further or if you have any questions about how this product can enhance your experience. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
